title: Years before eSIM, Steve Jobs wanted the first iPhone to have no SIM card slot
content:
We have recently been hearing rumors about Apple offering iPhone models that are only compatible with eSIM, without the physical SIM card slot. However, years before this technology even existed, Steve Jobs wished that the first iPhone didn’t have a SIM card slot.

more…

The post Years before eSIM, Steve Jobs wanted the first iPhone to have no SIM card slot appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Years before the eSIM technology even existed, Steve Jobs wished that the first iPhone didn't have a SIM card slot.
